settings.text:
Incredibly accurate meeting transcripts, even with multiple speakers. A huge timesaver. Highly recommend.
— David Chen, Project Manager

Flawless dictation and secure transcription of medical notes. Efficient, reliable, and essential for my practice.
— Dr. Sarah Jones, Physician

Perfect for lectures. The clear audio and AI summaries make studying so much easier. A must-have.
— Alex Rivera, University Student
*That’s an average of 1 hour saved every workday — time you can use for more important tasks.
We make things that work better and last longer. Our products solve real problems with clean design and honest materials.
Try powerful AI features risk-free every month.
Crystal-clear audio recordings, even in noisy environments. No more missed words.
Get key takeaways, meeting minutes and mind maps automatically. Save review time by 80%.
Instantly convert speech to accurate text, saving hours of manual work.
Record extensively (540 hrs) with long-lasting power (50 hrs continuous).
Ultra-compact, lightweight, and ready to record with a single touch.
From end-to-end encryption to flexible storage,we built our platform to put your privacy first.
